text:
1. Step onto the balance beam
2. Extend arms out to the sides for balance
3. Lift one leg off the ground
4. Place the lifted leg in front of the other leg on the beam
5. Shift weight onto the front leg
6. Lift the back leg off the beam
7. Extend the back leg straight behind the body
8. Keep the core engaged and maintain balance
9. Slowly bring the back leg back down to the beam
10. Repeat the process with the other leg
